representation_information.name: ISO/IEC 13818-7. Generic coding of moving pictures and associated audio information -- Part 7: Advanced Audio Coding (formal name; part of MPEG-2 documentation); AAC (common name)
representation_information.description: Perceptual encoding format designed as part of MPEG-2 for efficient distribution of waveform sound over moderate bandwidth connections; may be used at higher data rates for better fidelity.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
